summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of the circuit bit‑lookup method, checking how individual qubits and classical bits are resolved across various register configurations—including ancilla registers, multiple registers, and circuits without explicit registers—as well as constructor edge cases and error handling.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and robustness of the bit‑finding functionality in the quantum circuit library, providing confidence to developers and users that bits can be accurately identified within complex circuit structures.
